00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_trace_file_base.h - Shared internal tracing implementation
00023 
00024   Original Author: Philipp A. Hartmann, OFFIS, 2013-11-15
00025 
00026   CHANGE LOG AT END OF FILE

00029 /*****************************************************************************
00030 
00031    Acknowledgement: The tracing mechanism is based on the tracing
00032    mechanism developed at Infineon (formerly Siemens HL). Though this
00033    code is somewhat different, and significantly enhanced, the basics
00034    are identical to what was originally contributed by Infineon.  The
00035    contribution of Infineon in the development of this tracing
00036    technology is hereby acknowledged.
00037 
00038  *****************************************************************************/
00039 
00040 #ifndef SC_TRACE_FILE_BASE_H_INCLUDED_
00041 #define SC_TRACE_FILE_BASE_H_INCLUDED_
00042 
00043 #include <cstdio>
00044 
00045 // use callback-based tracing implementation
00046 #if defined( SC_ENABLE_SIMULATION_PHASE_CALLBACKS_TRACING )
00047 #  define SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_ 1
00048 #  include "sysc/kernel/sc_object.h"
00049 #else
00050 #  define SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_ 0
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #include "sysc/tracing/sc_trace.h"
00054 #include "sysc/tracing/sc_tracing_ids.h"
00055 
00056 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(SC_WIN_DLL_WARN)
00057 #pragma warning(push)
00058 #pragma warning(disable: 4251) // DLL import for std::string
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 namespace sc_core {
00062 
00063 // shared implementation of trace files
00064 class SC_API sc_trace_file_base
00065   : public sc_trace_file
00066 #if SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00067   , private sc_object // to be used as callback target
00068 #endif
00069 {
00070 public:
00071     typedef sc_time::value_type  unit_type;
00072 
00073     const char* filename() const
00074       { return filename_.c_str(); }
00075 
00076     bool delta_cycles() const
00077       { return trace_delta_cycles_; }
00078 
00079     // Also trace transitions between delta cycles if flag is true.
00080     virtual void delta_cycles(bool flag);
00081 
00082     // set a user-define timescale unit for the trace file
00083     virtual void set_time_unit( double v, sc_time_unit tu);
00084 
00085 protected:
00086     sc_trace_file_base( const char* name, const char* extension );
00087 
00088     // returns true, if trace file is already initialized
00089     bool is_initialized() const;
00090     // returns true, iff initialization has been performed in this call
00091     bool initialize();
00092     // ensure that file has been opened (needed for early write_comment())
00093     void open_fp();
00094     // perform format specific initialization
00095     virtual void do_initialize() = 0;
00096 
00097     // returns true, if new trace objects can still be added
00098     // (i.e. trace file is not yet initialized)
00099     bool add_trace_check( const std::string& name ) const;
00100 
00101     // tracefile time unit < kernel unit, extra units will be placed in low part
00102     bool has_low_units() const;
00103 
00104     // number of decimal digits in low units
00105     int  low_units_len() const;
00106 
00107     // get current kernel time in trace time units
00108     void timestamp_in_trace_units(unit_type &high, unit_type &low) const;
00109 
00110     // Flush results and close file.
00111     virtual ~sc_trace_file_base();
00112 
00113     static sc_time::value_type unit_to_fs(sc_time_unit tu);
00114 
00115     static std::string fs_unit_to_str(sc_trace_file_base::unit_type tu);
00116 
00117 #if SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00118 private:
00119     virtual void simulation_phase_callback();
00120 #endif // SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00121 
00122 protected:
00123     FILE* fp;                          // pointer to the trace file
00124 
00125     unit_type   trace_unit_fs;         // tracefile timescale unit in femtoseconds
00126     unit_type   kernel_unit_fs;        // kernel timescale unit in femtoseconds
00127     bool        timescale_set_by_user; // = true means set by user
00128 
00129 private:
00130     std::string filename_;             // name of the file (for reporting)
00131     bool        initialized_;          // tracing started?
00132     bool        trace_delta_cycles_;   // also trace delta transitions?
00133 
00134     static bool tracing_initialized_;  // shared setup of tracing implementation
00135 
00136 private: // disabled
00137     sc_trace_file_base( const sc_trace_file_base& ) /* = delete */;
00138     sc_trace_file_base& operator=( const sc_trace_file_base& ) /* = delete */;
00139 
00140 }; // class sc_trace_file_base
00141 
00142 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 
00144 
00145 // obtain formatted time string
00146 SC_API std::string localtime_string();
00147 
00148 } // namespace sc_core
00149 
00150 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(SC_WIN_DLL_WARN)
00151 #pragma warning(pop)
